SCRIPT.MSCRI:
$errors = 0 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY !-----------Building command arguments------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Configuration Detail " : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SONIC_CONFIG_DETAIL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** SHOW RUNNING CONFIGURATION ACTION EXECUTED ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** SHOW RUNNING CONFIGURATION ACTION FAILED ********"
:SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_SSH_RESOURCE !Build java arguments :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_ARGS
: SET &UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD#, "show runningconfiguration ") : SWITCH &UC4RB_SONIC_CONFIG_DETAIL# : CASE "BGP" : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD#, "bgp ") : CASE "Interfaces" : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD#, "interfaces ") : CASE "SNMP" : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD#, "snmp ") : CASE "NTP" : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD#, "ntp ") : ENDSWITCH : P "Command Executed: &UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD#" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_SONIC_SHOW_DETAIL_CMD# :SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = "&AGENT_TEMPDIR#\cmd-&$RUNID#.txt" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_TO_DEL# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :PUBLISH &UC4RB_FILE_TO_DEL#,,"TASK" :SET &UC4RB_OUTPUTMODE# = "0" :SET &UC4RB_CMD_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_RUN_COMMAND if(!$?) { $errors = 1 } !------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
: SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = "" : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() : SET &FLAG# = 0 : SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP",) : PROCESS &HND# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : IF &VALUE# EQ "UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND_STATUS::=SUCCESSFUL" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF
: IF &FLAG# EQ 0 : SET &FLAG# = STR_FIND(&VALUE#, "OUTPUT:") : SET &VALUE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&VALUE#, "OUTPUT:", "") : ENDIF
: IF &FLAG# NE 0 : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#, &VALUE#) : SET &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#, &NL#) : ENDIF
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
: ENDIF : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SONIC_OUTPUT#,,WORKFLOW
